examples.example: 我在这家公司里收获了很多成长和快乐。

translate.english: I have gained a lot of growth and happiness in this company.

examples.example: 我很庆幸能在这家充满活力的公司里工作。

translate.english: I am very glad to be able to work in this vibrant company.

examples.example: 我在公司里努力工作，不断实现着自己的价值。

translate.english: I work hard in the company and continuously realize my own value.
